maker: Shape designed by Jacques-François Deparis, modelled by the répareur Etienne-Henry Bono, painted by Antoine Caton, et al
title: Side Vase (with Telemachus and Termosorus)
description: Side Vase (with Telemachus and Termosorus); Shape designed by Jacques-François Deparis (French, active 1746 - 1797), modelled by the répareur Etienne-Henry Bono (French, active 1754 - 1781), painted by Antoine Caton (French, active 1753 - 1798), et al; Sèvres, France; 1781; Soft-paste porcelain, beau bleu ground color, polychrome enamel decoration, enamel imitating jewels, gilding, and gold foil; 40.6 × 24.8 × 18.4 cm (16 × 9 3/4 × 7 1/4 in.); 84.DE.718.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
